name: Age Calculator
description: Calculate your exact age in years, months, and days.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-calendar-days size-5"><path d="M8 2v4"></path><path d="M16 2v4"></path><rect width="18" height="18" x="3" y="4" rx="2"></rect><path d="M3 10h18"></path><path d="M8 14h.01"></path><path d="M12 14h.01"></path><path d="M16 14h.01"></path><path d="M8 18h.01"></path><path d="M12 18h.01"></path><path d="M16 18h.01"></path></svg>

name: Today's Date
description: View current date in a clear and easy to read format.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-calendar size-5"><path d="M8 2v4"></path><path d="M16 2v4"></path><rect width="18" height="18" x="3" y="4" rx="2"></rect><path d="M3 10h18"></path></svg>

name: Year Progress
description: Track how much of the current year has passed with real-time updates.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-timer size-5"><line x1="10" x2="14" y1="2" y2="2"></line><line x1="12" x2="15" y1="14" y2="11"></line><circle cx="12" cy="14" r="8"></circle></svg>

name: Coin Flip
description: Flip a virtual coin for quick and fair decision making.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-coins size-5"><circle cx="8" cy="8" r="6"></circle><path d="M18.09 10.37A6 6 0 1 1 10.34 18"></path><path d="M7 6h1v4"></path><path d="m16.71 13.88.7.71-2.82 2.82"></path></svg>

name: Dice Roll
description: Roll virtual dice for games or random number generation.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-dice5 size-5"><rect width="18" height="18" x="3" y="3" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><path d="M16 8h.01"></path><path d="M8 8h.01"></path><path d="M8 16h.01"></path><path d="M16 16h.01"></path><path d="M12 12h.01"></path></svg>

name: Random Number
description: Generate random numbers within your specified range.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-hash size-5"><line x1="4" x2="20" y1="9" y2="9"></line><line x1="4" x2="20" y1="15" y2="15"></line><line x1="10" x2="8" y1="3" y2="21"></line><line x1="16" x2="14" y1="3" y2="21"></line></svg>

name: Card Draw
description: Draw random cards from a virtual deck.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-layers size-5"><path d="M12.83 2.18a2 2 0 0 0-1.66 0L2.6 6.08a1 1 0 0 0 0 1.83l8.58 3.91a2 2 0 0 0 1.66 0l8.58-3.9a1 1 0 0 0 0-1.83z"></path><path d="M2 12a1 1 0 0 0 .58.91l8.6 3.91a2 2 0 0 0 1.65 0l8.58-3.9A1 1 0 0 0 22 12"></path><path d="M2 17a1 1 0 0 0 .58.91l8.6 3.91a2 2 0 0 0 1.65 0l8.58-3.9A1 1 0 0 0 22 17"></path></svg>

name: Random Name Picker
description: Randomly select names from your list for fair selection.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-users size-5"><path d="M16 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-4-4H6a4 4 0 0 0-4 4v2"></path><circle cx="9" cy="7" r="4"></circle><path d="M22 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-3-3.87"></path><path d="M16 3.13a4 4 0 0 1 0 7.75"></path></svg>

name: Wheel of Names
description: Spin the wheel to randomly select names from your list.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-circle-dot size-5"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="1"></circle></svg>

name: Study Time Allocator
description: Allocate your study time to different subjects and tasks.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-timer size-5"><line x1="10" x2="14" y1="2" y2="2"></line><line x1="12" x2="15" y1="14" y2="11"></line><circle cx="12" cy="14" r="8"></circle></svg>

name: Grade Improvement Simulator
description: Simulate grade improvement over time to track your progress.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-timer size-5"><line x1="10" x2="14" y1="2" y2="2"></line><line x1="12" x2="15" y1="14" y2="11"></line><circle cx="12" cy="14" r="8"></circle></svg>
